inclusion.criterion: middle aged according to WHO 55 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: presented by ACS (STEMI , Non STEMI) from July 2020 to June2021 in both CCU Of Internal Medicine Departemennt and and EL Orman Assiut University Hospital of Cardiology and Cardiothoracic Surgery.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: -Ranal disease ie stage 3,4 or on dialysis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG and PVD with significant bilateral carotid stenosis. He underwent Carotid U/S and Angiography which revealed an 80% stenosis of the R ICA and a 90% L ICA stenosis.
